objects.text:
• Ionic Plated Black Steel
• Chronograph Function
• Premium Grey Dial
• Scratch-Resistant Glass

product_details.name: BOSS Cloud Qtz Fashion Chrono Grey Round Dial Men's Analog Watch|Ionic Plated Black Steel Material|Black Color Band - 1514016
product_details.description: Brand: BOSS. Model: 1514016. Model Name: 1514016. Product Dimensions: 16 x 4.4 x 4.4 cm; 148 g. Batteries: 1 12V batteries required. (included). Special Features: Easy Reader, Lightweight, Glow In The Dark, Second Hand, Scratch-Resistant. Display Type: Analog. Power Source: Battery Powered. Batteries Included: Yes. Batteries Required: Yes. Battery cell composition: Silver Oxide. Speaker Diameter: 44 Millimeters. Country of Origin: Hong Kong. Item Weight: 148 g. Importer: MGI Distribution Pvt Ltd.210/2 Bellary road, sadashiv nagar 2nd floor upper Palace Orchards Bengalure- 560080. Item Dimensions Lx Wx H: 16 x 4.4 x 4.4 Centimeters. Net Quantity: 1 Count. Generic Name: Casual Watch.

banner_details:
This banner features a sleek, modern design promoting a luxury wristwatch. The layout is diagonally split with layered geometric accents, giving a dynamic, professional look. The top-left corner begins with a bold title labeled as `heading`, followed by a sleek subheading `subheading` in a futuristic font. Below, there's a vertical list of product highlights in the `description` layer, enhancing user clarity. A strong white price tag identified by `price` draws attention. Beneath it, a rectangular call-to-action button (`cta_background`) houses the label `cta`, encouraging users to shop. On the right side, a high-resolution, centered watch image (`product_image`) balances the composition.

**Color Palette:**
- Jet Black (#1A1A1A)
- Charcoal Gray (#2A2A2A)
- Gunmetal (#444444)
- Light Slate Gray (#888888)
- Cool Silver (#CCCCCC)
- White (#FFFFFF)
product_color: The product image presents a BOSS wristwatch with a refined, monochromatic palette ideal for a premium and masculine advertisement banner. The primary colors are a brushed black metal (`#1C1C1C`) used on the band and casing, paired with a matte charcoal grey dial (`#4C4C4C`) that lends a subtle industrial feel. The sub-dials are outlined in darker graphite (`#2F2F2F`) and finely contrasted with light metallic elements (`#A0A0A0`) for visibility. The blend of dark tones highlights the precision detailing without overwhelming the design. An accent of white (`#FFFFFF`) in date and marker indicators ensures clarity and elegance amidst the grayscale theme.
